channel.title: Comments on: Swoon-Worthy Stories at Worldcon and Cheering The Hugo Awards
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Shel Graves
item.dc:creator: Shel Graves
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://lunastationquarterly.com/swoon-worthy-stories-at-worldcon-and-cheering-the-hugo-awards/#comment-646">J. Askew</a>.
Excellent, the world needs more giggles. And, hurrah! Thanks for reading.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to J. Askew.

Excellent, the world needs more giggles. And, hurrah! Thanks for reading.

item.title: By: J. Askew
item.dc:creator: J. Askew
item.description: Literally giggled most of the way through this article. Such a great viewpoint to hear about the Hugo awards! (5-star review from me too)
item.content:encoded: Literally giggled most of the way through this article. Such a great viewpoint to hear about the Hugo awards! (5-star review from me too)

item.title: By: Shel Graves
item.dc:creator: Shel Graves
item.description: Yesterday, after this was written, the Best New Writer award was renamed sparked in part by author Jeanette Ng's acceptance speech at the Hugos. More about her speech here: https://www.scmp.com/lifestyle/arts-culture/article/3024530/hong-kong-winner-john-w-campbell-sci-fi-award-stands-fascist. News about the award name change here: https://locusmag.com/2019/08/campbell-award-renamed.
item.content:encoded: Yesterday, after this was written, the Best New Writer award was renamed sparked in part by author Jeanette Ng’s acceptance speech at the Hugos. More about her speech here: https://www.scmp.com/lifestyle/arts-culture/article/3024530/hong-kong-winner-john-w-campbell-sci-fi-award-stands-fascist. News about the award name change here: https://locusmag.com/2019/08/campbell-award-renamed.
